subject: Clarification on deprecation of runBefores and runAfters
msgSnippet: In BlockJunit4ClassRunner there is a deprecation with no explicit alternative for runBefores and runAfters (at least I didn t understand the comment, so if it
messageBody:
In BlockJunit4ClassRunner there is a deprecation with no explicit alternative for runBefores and runAfters (at least I didn't understand the comment, so if it is explicit it is not very clear). Can someone clarify what is going to happen here?

Some third party libraries extend BlockJUnit4ClassRunner and override these methods. What are they supposed to do? It seems quite reasonable to want to modify this behaviour (e.g. to repeat a test method but only run the befores and afters once, or to add behaviour after the befores but before the test method).
